name: Tap Ninja (Default Cube)
description:
Fruit ninja except you click or tap shapes.

Currently a work in progress.

Pressing:

  • White = 5 points.
  • Green = 25 points.
  • Red = -50 points.

Losing a shape gets you -50 points.

F11 for fullscreen.

for how long can you survive without getting a negative score value

also i found some cool shaders
